analysis.key_quote: I strongly oppose moving policy-influencing positions into Schedule Policy/Career or any other Schedule F classification, as this would let cronyism, partisanship, and self-interest dictate Federal policy decisions, instead of the studied, nonpartisan expertise that has proven to best serve the nation.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about cronyism and partisanship, which indicates a strong stance against the politicization of civil service.
